thread.title: BRIEF-Sphere 3D Corp. Announces Pricing Of $2.3 Million Public Offering Of Common Stock And Warrants

title: BRIEF-Sphere 3D Corp. Announces Pricing Of $2.3 Million Public Offering Of Common Stock And Warrants

organizations.name: public offering of common stock and warrants reuters

text:
April 13, 2018 / 1:06 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Sphere 3D Corp. Announces Pricing Of $2.3 Million Public Offering Of Common Stock And Warrants Reuters Staff 
April 13 (Reuters) - Sphere 3D Corp: 
* CORP. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF $2.3 MILLION PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK AND WARRANTS 
* OFFERING OF 3.3 MILLION SHARES AND WARRANTS PRICED AT $0.70 PER COMMON SHARE AND ACCOMPANYING WARRANT 
* PRICING OF 3.3 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK,WARRANTS TO BUY UP TO 990,000 SHARES OF COMMON STOCK AT $0.70 PER SHARE & ACCOMPANYING WARRANT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
